mapper.select:
select
from s_info_t a
AND a.accept_no like '%${acceptNo}%'
AND a.unit_no = #{unitNo}
AND str_to_date(a.create_time,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') between str_to_date(#{search_satrt},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and str_to_date(#{search_end},' %Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND str_to_date(a.update_time,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') between str_to_date(#{search_satrt},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and str_to_date(#{search_end},' %Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
